name: Pi.Icc_eq
initialProofState:
ι : Type u_1
α : ι → Type u_2
inst✝⁴ : Fintype ι
inst✝³ : DecidableEq ι
inst✝² : (i : ι) → DecidableEq (α i)
inst✝¹ : (i : ι) → PartialOrder (α i)
inst✝ : (i : ι) → LocallyFiniteOrder (α i)
a b : (i : ι) → α i
⊢ Eq (Finset.Icc a b) (Fintype.piFinset fun i => Finset.Icc (a i) (b i))
decl:
theorem Icc_eq : Icc a b = piFinset fun i => Icc (a i) (b i) :=
  rfl

name: Pi.card_Icc
initialProofState:
ι : Type u_1
α : ι → Type u_2
inst✝⁴ : Fintype ι
inst✝³ : DecidableEq ι
inst✝² : (i : ι) → DecidableEq (α i)
inst✝¹ : (i : ι) → PartialOrder (α i)
inst✝ : (i : ι) → LocallyFiniteOrder (α i)
a b : (i : ι) → α i
⊢ Eq (Finset.Icc a b).card (Finset.univ.prod fun i => (Finset.Icc (a i) (b i)).card)
decl:
theorem card_Icc : #(Icc a b) = ∏ i, #(Icc (a i) (b i)) :=
  card_piFinset _

name: Pi.card_Ico
initialProofState:
ι : Type u_1
α : ι → Type u_2
inst✝⁴ : Fintype ι
inst✝³ : DecidableEq ι
inst✝² : (i : ι) → DecidableEq (α i)
inst✝¹ : (i : ι) → PartialOrder (α i)
inst✝ : (i : ι) → LocallyFiniteOrder (α i)
a b : (i : ι) → α i
⊢ Eq (Finset.Ico a b).card (HSub.hSub (Finset.univ.prod fun i => (Finset.Icc (a i) (b i)).card) 1)
decl:
theorem card_Ico : #(Ico a b) = ∏ i, #(Icc (a i) (b i)) - 1 := by
  rw [card_Ico_eq_card_Icc_sub_one, card_Icc]

inst✝² : (i : ι) → DecidableEq (α i)
inst✝¹ : (i : ι) → PartialOrder (α i)
inst✝ : (i : ι) → LocallyFiniteOrderBot (α i)
b : (i : ι) → α i
⊢ Eq (Finset.Iic b).card (Finset.univ.prod fun i => (Finset.Iic (b i)).card)
decl: lemma card_Iic : #(Iic b) = ∏ i, #(Iic (b i)) := card_piFinset _

name: Pi.uIcc_eq
initialProofState:
ι : Type u_1
α : ι → Type u_2
inst✝⁴ : Fintype ι
inst✝³ : DecidableEq ι
inst✝² : (i : ι) → DecidableEq (α i)
inst✝¹ : (i : ι) → Lattice (α i)
inst✝ : (i : ι) → LocallyFiniteOrder (α i)
a b : (i : ι) → α i
⊢ Eq (Finset.uIcc a b) (Fintype.piFinset fun i => Finset.uIcc (a i) (b i))
decl: theorem uIcc_eq : uIcc a b = piFinset fun i => uIcc (a i) (b i) := rfl

name: Pi.card_uIcc
initialProofState:
ι : Type u_1
α : ι → Type u_2
inst✝⁴ : Fintype ι
inst✝³ : DecidableEq ι
inst✝² : (i : ι) → DecidableEq (α i)
inst✝¹ : (i : ι) → Lattice (α i)
inst✝ : (i : ι) → LocallyFiniteOrder (α i)
a b : (i : ι) → α i
⊢ Eq (Finset.uIcc a b).card (Finset.univ.prod fun i => (Finset.uIcc (a i) (b i)).card)
decl: theorem card_uIcc : #(uIcc a b) = ∏ i, #(uIcc (a i) (b i)) := card_Icc _ _
